title: United in Ashes
description: My step-sister is the thorn in my side, and the only thing I've ever wanted that I couldn't have.I've broken her to ensure there's nothing left of Woodsboro but ashes.As secrets are revealed, and friends turn to enemies, one thing is clear.Carrington Jane wasn't the enemy all along.It turns out, she was the only one I could trust.This is book TWO in the Woodsboro duet and book one must be read first. It is a DARK, MF STEP-BROTHER college romance with DARK ACADEMIA VIBES. Sebastian is Jealous/Possessive antihero. Please note that there are dark themes throughout that may make some readers uncomfortable. There is no cheating.
author: Rory Ireland
